Recognizer

Class SphinxRecognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Recognizer.SphinxRecognizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StandardRecognizer

    public class SphinxRecognizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements StandardRecognizer
    A simple HelloWorld demo showing a simple speech application built using Sphinx-4. This application uses the Sphinx-4 endpointer, which automatically segments incoming audio into utterances and silences.

      • SphinxRecognizer

        public SphinxRecognizer(java.lang.String configName,
                java.lang.String name)
        creates a new Sphinx recognizer using the given config name. the config name is used a prefix for XMLs, language model, dictionaries etc.
        Parameters:

        name - name of recognizer
